languages.text: {n}Космодесантник Хаоса возвышается над склонившими головы {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножрецами{/g} словно мрачная скала. Гигант неторопливо, почти нараспев читает проповедь. От одного звука его глубокого низкого голоса вас бросает в липкий пот, а к горлу подкатывает тошнота.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Хаос-десантник возвышается над склонившими головы техножрецами словно мрачная скала. Гигант неторопливо, почти нараспев читает проповедь. От одного звука его глубокого низкого голоса вас бросает в липкий пот, а к горлу подкатывает тошнота.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The Chaos Space Marine towers over the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g}' bowed heads like a dark cliff. He is reciting a sermon — slowly, almost chanting. From the mere sound of his deep, low voice, you break into a cold sweat and your gorge rises.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Космодесантник Хаоса возвышается над склонившими головы {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножрецами{/g} словно мрачная скала. Гигант неторопливо, почти нараспев читает проповедь. От одного звука его глубокого низкого голоса вас бросает в липкий пот, а к горлу подкатывает тошнота.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Chaos Space Marine towers over the Tech-Priests' bowed heads like a dark cliff. He is preaching — slowly, almost chanting. From the mere sound of his deep, low voice, you break into a cold sweat as nausea hits your throat.{/n}

{n}The Chaos Space Marine towers over the Tech-Priests' bowed heads like a dark cliff. He is preaching — slowly, almost chanting. From the mere sound of his deep, low voice, you break into a cold sweat as nausea hits your throat.{/n}

{n}The Chaos Space Marine towers over the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g}' bowed heads like a dark cliff. He is preaching — slowly, almost chanting. From the mere sound of his deep, low voice, you break into a cold sweat as nausea hits your throat.{/n}

{n}The Chaos Space Marine towers over the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g}' bowed heads like a dark cliff. He is preaching — slowly, almost chanting. From the mere sound of his deep, low voice, you break into a cold sweat as nausea hits your throat.{/n}

{n}The Chaos Space Marine towers over the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g}' bowed heads like a dark cliff. He is reciting a sermon — slowly, almost chanting. From the mere sound of his deep, low voice, you break into a cold sweat and your gorge rises.{/n}

{n}The Chaos Space Marine towers over the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g}' bowed heads like a dark cliff. He is reciting a sermon — slowly, almost chanting. From the mere sound of his deep, low voice, you break into a cold sweat and your gorge rises.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这位混沌星际战士站在{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术神甫{/g}身边，仿佛黑暗的悬崖一般。他正在背诵一篇布道，他的声音非常缓慢，几乎像是在吟唱。光是听到他低沉的声音，你感觉浑身冒冷汗，就连胃都开始抽搐起来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Chaos Space Marine towers over the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g}' bowed heads like a dark cliff. He is reciting a sermon — slowly, almost chanting. From the mere sound of his deep, low voice, you break into a cold sweat and your gorge rises.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这位混沌星际战士站在{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术祭司{/g}身边，仿佛黑暗的悬崖一般。他正在背诵一篇布道，他的声音非常缓慢，几乎像是在吟唱。光是听到他低沉的声音，你感觉浑身冒冷汗，就连胃都开始抽搐起来。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El Marine Espacial del Caos se alza sobre las cabezas gachas de los {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdotes{/g} como si de un oscuro acantilado se tratara. Está recitando un sermón, despacio, casi como si fuera un cántico. El sonido te su voz, grave y baja, te provoca sudores fríos y hace que se te revuelva el estómago.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Chaos Space Marine towers over the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g}' bowed heads like a dark cliff. He is reciting a sermon — slowly, almost chanting. From the mere sound of his deep, low voice, you break into a cold sweat and your gorge rises.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El Marine Espacial del Caos se alza sobre las cabezas gachas de los {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdotes{/g} como si de un oscuro acantilado se tratara. Está recitando un sermón, despacio, casi como si fuera un cántico. El sonido te su voz, grave y baja, te provoca sudores fríos y hace que se te revuelva el estómago.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ケイオス・スペースマリーンは、暗い崖のように、跪く{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}の頭上にそびえ立つ。司祭は説教を読んでいる…ゆっくりと、まるで呪文のように。その深く低いただの音に、冷や汗が溢れて吐き気を催す。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Chaos Space Marine towers over the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g}' bowed heads like a dark cliff. He is reciting a sermon — slowly, almost chanting. From the mere sound of his deep, low voice, you break into a cold sweat and your gorge rises.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ケイオス・スペースマリーンは、暗い崖のように、跪く{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}の頭上にそびえ立つ。司祭は説教を読んでいる…ゆっくりと、まるで呪文のように。その深く低いただの音に、冷や汗が溢れて吐き気を催す。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Chaos Space Marine ragt über den gebeugten Köpfen der {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriester{/g} auf wie eine dunkle Klippe. Er predigt – langsam, fast singend. Allein durch seine tiefe, leise Stimme bricht dir kalter Schweiß aus, und deine Kehle schwillt an.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Chaos Space Marine towers over the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g}' bowed heads like a dark cliff. He is reciting a sermon — slowly, almost chanting. From the mere sound of his deep, low voice, you break into a cold sweat and your gorge rises.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Chaos Space Marine ragt über den gebeugten Köpfen der {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriester{/g} auf wie eine dunkle Klippe. Er predigt – langsam, fast singend. Allein durch seine tiefe, leise Stimme bricht dir kalter Schweiß aus, und deine Kehle schwillt an.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tel une sombre falaise, le Space Marine du Chaos domine de toute sa hauteur les têtes courbées des {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtres{/g}. Il récite lentement un sermon, presque à la façon d'une psalmodie. Le seul son de sa voix grave et caverneuse vous donne des sueurs froides et vous soulève le cœur.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Chaos Space Marine towers over the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g}' bowed heads like a dark cliff. He is reciting a sermon — slowly, almost chanting. From the mere sound of his deep, low voice, you break into a cold sweat and your gorge rises.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tel une sombre falaise, le Space Marine du Chaos domine de toute sa hauteur les têtes courbées des {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtres{/g}. Il récite lentement un sermon, presque à la façon d'une psalmodie. Le seul son de sa voix grave et caverneuse vous donne des sueurs froides et vous soulève le cœur.{/n}

languages.text: Bir Kaosçu Uzay Piyadesi, {n}{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahiplerin{/g} bükük boyunları karşısında zebella gibi dikiliyor. Yavaşça, neredeyse ilahi okurmuş gibi vaaz veriyor. Derin ve kısık sesi, soğuk terler dökmene ve midenin kalkmasına sebep oluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Chaos Space Marine towers over the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g}' bowed heads like a dark cliff. He is reciting a sermon — slowly, almost chanting. From the mere sound of his deep, low voice, you break into a cold sweat and your gorge rises.{/n}

traits.locale_text: Bir Kaosçu Uzay Piyadesi, {n}{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahipler{/g}in bükük boyunları karşısında zebella gibi dikiliyor. Yavaşça, neredeyse ilahi okurmuş gibi vaaz veriyor. Derin ve kısık sesi, soğuk terler dökmene ve midenin kalkmasına sebep oluyor.{/n}
